name: Generation with MCP
description: Enabling the LLM to use external tools via the Model Context Protocol.
content:
# LoLLMs Generation with MCP (Model Context Protocol)

Enable LLMs to use external tools (MCPs) to perform actions (web search, file I/O, etc.).

```python
from lollms_client import LollmsClient

lc = LollmsClient()

# List available tools on the server
tools = lc.list_mcp_tools()

# Execute a task using tool-calling capabilities
response = lc.generate_with_tools(
    prompt="Find the current price of Bitcoin",
    tools=tools
)
```
